Rihanna earned the title of "sexiest woman alive" by Esquire magazine in 2011.

And the queen of R&B has lived up to her title as she treated her followers to a very seductive slow-mo video of herself posing in a tiny black bikini.

The 31-year-old Barbadian babe sent fans into meltdown with the sultry clip as she strutted past the camera.

Songstress Rihanna oozes confidence as she looked directly ahead of her, wearing a long black kaftan which added to her full-glam look.

Her dark hair was slicked back in loose waves, and she sported a pair of funky sunglasses to hide her face, while smoking a cigarette.

There was no hiding her curvaceous bod when she got to the end of the garden, as she paused and turned to show off the many tattoos she has, including one on her thigh.

(Image: Instagram)

It's not known if the stunning location is her own home or a holiday in paradise, but the background features huge palm trees and dreamy views.

Fans of the Umbrella hit maker praised her confidence.

One wrote: "You are a whole mood," while another joked: "Damn I jus passed out."

(Image: Instagram)

Another gushed: "My queen is so fine," while others told the star she is "iconic".

Even world famous supermodel Winnie Harlow left a comment.

"RUDE," she penned with a flame emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

The sultry video comes after it was announced that RiRi will star in November's issue of Vogue.

She has made history as the issue will star her again for the sixth time.

According to Forbes, Robyn Rihanna Fenty is the wealthiest female musician in the world, so it's no wonder the singer has been asked to front the issue once again.

(Image: Instagram)

Jahleel Weaver, Fenty's style director told Vogue : "Every woman isn't Rihanna, but many women relate to her all-over-the-place-ness.

"She is fearless, but she is also a businesswoman. She's a girlfriend. She's a friend. She's all of these things."
description: The singer stepped out in a scantily-clad outfit to show off her hot bod
